医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
越来越多的证据将超级加工食品消耗与体重增加联系起来研究表明，促进水果和蔬菜不足以打击体重增加，强调了超加工食品在肥胖中的重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/10250214/vives-increashiper-links-ultra-processed-food-food-food-food commaption to-weight to-weight-weight gain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/10250214/vivence-increashine-links-ultra-processed-food-food-food-food-food-complatmeting to-weight to-weight weight giain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3E598E11-DEED-4FC8-8CB2-543894F8DF4C Fri, 14 Feb 2025 04:53:00 -0500 Evidence increasingly links ultra-processed food consumption to weight gain
研究强调了阴道微生物组研究需要更多多样性的需求这项研究强调了阴道微生物组研究中全球股权的需求，解决了健康差异并改善全球女性健康策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/study-highlights-the--need-for-more-diversity-in-vaginal-in-vaginal-microbiome-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/study-highlights-the--need-for-more-diversity-in-vaginal-in-vaginal-microbiome-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59065100-F216-432E-80A5-D71D08E6CDCF Fri, 14 Feb 2025 04:17:00 -0500 Study highlights the need for more diversity in vaginal microbiome research
使用Integra Biosciences的解决方案来升级NGS工作流程Integra Biosciences提供液体处理溶液和磁模块，以简化NGS样品制备的每个阶段。这些创新的工具有助于减少错误，提高测序数据的精度和可靠性，并提供更有效的流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/leveling-up-ngs-workflows-with-integra-biosciencese28099-solutions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/leveling-up-ngs-workflows-with-integra-biosciencese28099-solutions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96209f5c-b0ca-4722-9fa4-367582cb0d6d Fri, 14 Feb 2025 02:53:00 -0500 Leveling up NGS workflows with INTEGRA Biosciences’ solutions
干扰素途径激活被确定为OPLL发病机理中的关键驱动力后纵韧带（OPLL）的骨化是一种进行性脊柱疾病，其特征是脊柱异位骨形成，导致由于脊髓压缩而导致严重的神经系统症状。这种情况在亚洲国家更为普遍，并且与各种遗传和激素因素有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/interferon-pathway-activation-istivation-isendified-side-sy-bey-driver-in-oplll-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/interferon-pathway-activation-istivation-istimified-side-s-key-driver-in-opll-opll-pathogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68E9B793-A97B-4C73-998A-41F690C8A668 Fri, 14 Feb 2025 02:06:04 -0500 Interferon pathway activation identified as key driver in OPLL pathogenesis
下一代疫苗的工程安全有效的疫苗病毒载体宣布了《人畜共患杂志》的新文章出版物。 Vacinia病毒（VACV）赋予了针对天花的病原体Variola病毒的交叉保护免疫，因此已被广泛利用为预防性疫苗。尽管在1980年代消除了天花，但由于将VARIOLA病毒用作生物武器的潜在威胁，涉及VACV的研究工作仍在继续，这对人类健康构成了严重的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/Engineering-safe-and-effective-vaccinia-virus-virus-virus-virus-vectors-for-next-next-next-generation-generation-vacines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/Engineering-safe-and-efferce--vaccinia-virus-virus-virus-virus-virus-virus-for-next-next-next-generation-vacines-vacines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22c998bb-30bc-4300-98d0-8a26284e4b56 Fri, 14 Feb 2025 01:46:36 -0500 Engineering safe and effective vaccinia virus vectors for next-generation vaccines
自我采样：HPV筛选的新选项生殖器人乳头瘤病毒是美国最常见的性传播感染，被认为是99％以上的宫颈癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/self-sampling-new-option-for-hpv-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/self-sampling-new-option-for-hpv-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0770D0FD-9958-43F5-87CB-D90AAA80ACIED Fri, 14 Feb 2025 01:10:50 -0500 Self-sampling: New option for HPV screening
研究人员尽管治疗了，但仍发现持续血凝块的原因一群研究人员在血液学领域做出了新的发现，为自发和不寻常的血液封闭的解释提供了解释，尽管全剂量血液稀释剂治疗了，但仍在继续发生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/researchers-uncover-cause-cause-of-persistern---------------------------------------aaspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/researchers-uncover-cause-cause-of-persistern-blood-clots-clots-defte-wareatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6Ae85f3d-4A37-4515-808F-F-F88047D2CA15 Fri, 14 Feb 2025 01:01:22 -0500 Researchers uncover cause of persistent blood clots despite treatment
传统的性别角色一直在现代育儿中关于父母职责的对话仍由母亲领导，即使父母双方都赚了相同的钱，也发现了UCL研究人员的一项新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/traditional-gender-persist-persist-in-modern-parenting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/traditional-gender-pers-persist-in-modern-parenting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25fd824c-3577-43A0-B2F4-03F4-03F9B4F17702 Fri, 14 Feb 2025 00:37:53 -0500 Traditional gender roles persist in modern parenting
哈佛大学研究人员地图70,000鼠大脑中的突触连接哈佛大学的研究人员使用了能够记录大量神经元的小而telltale的突触信号的硅芯片，绘制了大约2,000只大鼠神经元的70,000多个突触连接。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/harvard-researchers-map-70000-synnaptic-connections-in-rat-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/harvard-researchers-map-70000-synnaptic-connections-in-rat-brain-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1198769-1d0c-4f92-8893-11190ec3a71 Fri, 14 Feb 2025 00:36:26 -0500 Harvard researchers map 70,000 synaptic connections in rat brain
研究人员确定了Lennox-Gastaut综合征的遗传原因贝勒医学院，JAN和Dan Duncan神经研究所（Duncan NRI）的研究人员，德克萨斯儿童医院，贝勒遗传学和合作机构为患有Lennox-Gastaut综合征的儿童提供了期待已久的罕见遗传诊断，一种发育性癫痫性脑病（DEE）与严重，复杂形式的癫痫和发育延迟有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/researchers-sideify-genetify-genetify-genetify-cause-fennox-lennox-gastaut-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250214/researchers-sideify-genetify-genetify-genetify-genetify-genox-f-lennox-gastaut-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18C07D15-F4EB-493C-B1D7-E85FA0E3F74D Fri, 14 Feb 2025 00:35:21 -0500 Researchers identify genetic cause of Lennox-Gastaut syndrome
